data.title: Aggressive Yellow Control Dart From Garage
data.description: Use this dart to effectively contest for Yellow control, it scans all of the Defender positions there and a good portion of the B Site.

data.title: Default Info Dart for Crane From B Long
data.description: Here's a simple, yet effective dart lineup that scans any Defender contesting for B Long control.

data.title: B Long Execute Dart to Mid B Site
data.description: Enable your teammates with this effective dart, as it scans Defenders playing Mid Site and Top Site.

data.title: A Belt To A Site Tower Recon Bolt
data.description: This is useful for quickly scanning players inside of the Tower on A Site from Upper A Belt.
